name: Chris Suszynski
bio: I work at Red Hat as a Senior Software Engineer on the OpenShift Serverless team. I can describe myself as a software craftsman with over 15 years of experience in various technologies such as Golang, Java, Ruby, Python and Rust. My main interests are hybrid cloud technologies, especially Kubernetes and WASI technologies, and clear architecture for applications. I work on open-source software and strongly believe in its success.
